problem.markdown:
>>Flip a biased coin repeatedly. Its probability of heads is .55. Tails comes up on the first three flips. What is the probability that the first time that heads comes up is on the 5th flip? (Enter 4 decimal places)<<
= 0.2475+-0.0025

numericalresponse.label: Flip a biased coin repeatedly. Its probability of heads is .55. Tails comes up on the first three flips. What is the probability that the first time that heads comes up is on the 5th flip? (Enter 4 decimal places)
